name: io.github.saseq/discord-mcp
description: A MCP server for the Discord integration. Enable your AI assistants to seamlessly interact with Discord. Enhance your Discord experience with powerful automation capabilities.

tools.name: get_server_info
tools.description: Get detailed discord server information

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send a message to a specific channel

tools.name: edit_message
tools.description: Edit a message from a specific channel

tools.name: delete_message
tools.description: Delete a message from a specific channel

tools.name: read_messages
tools.description: Read recent message history from a specific channel

tools.name: send_private_message
tools.description: Send a private message to a specific user

tools.name: edit_private_message
tools.description: Edit a private message from a specific user

tools.name: delete_private_message
tools.description: Delete a private message from a specific user

tools.name: read_private_messages
tools.description: Read recent message history from a specific user

tools.name: add_reaction
tools.description: Add a reaction (emoji) to a specific message

tools.name: remove_reaction
tools.description: Remove a specified reaction (emoji) from a message

tools.name: delete_channel
tools.description: Delete a channel

tools.name: find_channel
tools.description: Find a channel type and ID using name and server ID

tools.name: list_channels
tools.description: List of all channels

tools.name: create_category
tools.description: Create a new category for channels

tools.name: delete_category
tools.description: Delete a category

tools.name: find_category
tools.description: Find a category ID using name and server ID

tools.name: list_channels_in_category
tools.description: List of channels in a specific category

tools.name: create_webhook
tools.description: Create a new webhook on a specific channel

tools.name: delete_webhook
tools.description: Delete a webhook

tools.name: list_webhooks
tools.description: List of webhooks on a specific channel

tools.name: send_webhook_message
tools.description: Send a message via webhook
